parameter.name: av.lx
Luma horizontal matrix
parameter.comment: Set the luma matrix horizontal size

parameter.name: av.ly
Luma vertical matrix
parameter.comment: Set the luma matrix vertical size

parameter.name: av.la
Luma strength
parameter.comment:
Set the luma effect strength.
Reasonable values are between -1.5 and 1.5. Negative values will blur the input video, while positive values will sharpen it, a value of 0 will disable the effect.
